column4: hi all, I'm having a problem with the sound in Hardy Heron - I can hear sound, but the quality is pretty bad
can somebody give me advice on where I can start troubleshooting?
the quality of the sound in Hardy Heron is pretty bad
was the sound quality good with a different os on the same hardware?
I just upgraded from 7.10 this morning, and the sound quality went bad as a result
ok, sure, can you direct me regarding what settings to edit?
not that I can really help, but what exactly is different about the sound?
jimconncat: it sounds like I'm playing from a cheap set of speakers
also, I had this quick-launcher (not sure what it's called) on the top-panel - it seems to have disappeared
how do I get that back?
right-click on the top panel, and choose "Add to Panel"
sou][ight, what exactly do I do in alsamixer?
oops...sorry, I think I'm confusing you by mixing two different issues!
my problem's that the sound from the system seems to be buggered after the upgrade to Hardy Heron
I'm not sure what you might have had for a quick launch applet. Maybe it was a drawer.
that's fine, that's not a major issue
